title: Is 4.5 inches normal for a 13-year-old? - Quora

response.answer_text: it is not normal for 13 year old your height should be at least 4.9–5.1 inches. here are two videos these are useful watch them okay. And don’t be sad about it ok. it too was really short, after the exercises I am tall as ever. https://youtu.be/KYhkDviO6IU , https://youtu.be/PVEYaYtGQdE ,
